content: **the family of bees is split up into 3 patterns ** 1 queen bee here 1 2 baby bee here 2 3 little crown here 3 **yarn & hook** use any yarn and hook of your choosing i used worsted weight yarn red heart comfort with a 4mm hook 1 https //www amigurumitogo com/2020/04/free-amigurumi-bee-crochet-pattern html 2 https //www amigurumitogo com/2020/04/little-bee-free-crochet-pattern html 3 https //www amigurumitogo com/2019/02/little-crown-for-girl-and-her-dragon html
